title: UFC on ESPN+ 20: Make your predictions for Demian Maia vs. Ben Askren
text:
We want your predictions for Saturday’s UFC on ESPN+ 20 event in Singapore.

Our staff picks feature includes the consensus picks from MMA Junkie readers. Simply cast your vote for each bout below, and we’ll use the official tallies that are registered by Thursday at noon ET (9 a.m. PT).

Those MMA Junkie reader consensus picks will be part of the UFC on ESPN+ 20 event staff predictions we release Friday ahead of the event. UFC on ESPN+ 20 takes place Saturday at Singapore Indoor Stadium in Singapore. The card streams on ESPN+.

Make your picks for all five main-card fights inside:
description: We want your predictions for Saturday's UFC on ESPN+ 20 event in Singapore.
